title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, October 4, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of Buster Keaton (1895). Born to vaudevillian parents, he became a deadpan and impressively physical comedian.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Buster Keaton (1895). Born to vaudevillian parents, he became a deadpan and impressively physical comedian.
